article.name: Powerpuff Girl Jigsaw Puzzle
article.description:
My fourth refinement of my jigsaw puzzle code.
You might want to launch it in a new window...
Put the pieces together ontop of the image (that dissapears). There are ten different designs to complete, and after finishing each one you will have the opportunity to download the image as a background for your desktop.
How cool? If your a ppg fan, very.
article.keywords: powerpuff girls jigsaw puzzle game desktop background blossom bubbles buttercup professor utonium him mojo-jojo townsville
